title: Woodland natural capital accounts
description: Natural capital accounts containing information on ecosystem services for woodlands in the UK.
datasetNotes: On landing page click on the latest version (there is currently only 1 version for 2020) this will open a new page scroll down to the heading 1. main points, to the right click on he green box which states 'view all data used in this statistical bulletin' this will open another page, click on the top link  'Woodland natural capital accounts, UK: supplementary information' this will open a further page and a XLS spreadsheet can be found under 'your download option' Current'
sizingNotes: Simple table structure with some footnotes one table has a supporting map along with the table which will need to be stripped out
